summary: Upon receiving a shocking telegram from his cousin, a man recounts his early life, as a member of a broad family full of dark secrets that slowly reveal themselves through the clan ceremonies.
cast: Kenzô Kawarasaki|Atsuko Kaku|Atsuo Nakamura|Kiyoshi Tsuchiya|Nobuko Otowa|Hôsei Komatsu|Rokkô Toura|Fumio Watanabe|Shizue Kawarazaki|Chisako Hara|Maki Takayama|Sue Mitobe|Ryuichi Tsubaki|Yumi Narushima|Yoshiaki Ota|Yukihiro Tsubaki|Eitarô Ozawa|Taiji Tonoyama|Akiko Koyama|Kei Satô
title: Gishiki
